author: lryan
msg: Allow for recursive loading of core and other features from a single path

author: jdcasey
msg: Fix some problems with the CLI reporter when the reactor manager hasn't been created yet (in cases where reading the projects for the reactor failed, for instance).

author: etnu
msg: Modified json.js to accept single quotes around strings. This technically violates the JSON spec, but it is needed as a short term solution to deal with improperly implemented json generators (including our own json proxy).

author: hlship
msg: TAPESTRY-2057: Add EventLink component that can create a link that triggers an arbitrarily named event in its container
